message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $875000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product for $912500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that $912500 is a fair price. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product for $915000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $915000 is a fair price. I'm willing to pay $890000 for the product. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $890000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product for $910000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $910000 is a fair price. I'm willing to pay $885000 for the product. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $885000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product for $900000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $900000 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to pay $890000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
